author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-AAT Holding To Buy Back Shares At 23 Zlotys/Shr
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - AAT HOLDING SA:
* SAID ON FRIDAY IT IS LAUNCHING A SHARE BUYBACK FOR UP TO 1,970,721 OWN SHARES REPRESENTING 24.63% OF COMPANYâ€™S SHARE CAPITAL
* PROPOSED PURCHASE PRICE IS 23 ZLOTYS PER SHARE * COMPANY ITSELF WILL BUY NOT MORE THAN 797,536 OWN SHARES AND ITS UNIT, POLON, WILL BUY NOT MORE THAN 1,173,185 SHARES
* EXPECTED DATE OF TRANSACTIONS SETTLEMENT IS MARCH 29 Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
